com.github.amlcurran.showcaseview

Class SimpleShowcaseEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.amlcurran.showcaseview.SimpleShowcaseEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnShowcaseEventListener

    public class SimpleShowcaseEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnShowcaseEventListener
    Basic implementation of OnShowcaseEventListener which does nothing for each event, but can be override for each one.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.github.amlcurran.showcaseview.OnShowcaseEventListener

      void onShowcaseViewDidHide(ShowcaseView showcaseView)
      Called when the animation hiding the ShowcaseView has finished, and it is no longer visible on the screen.

      Called when the ShowcaseView has been told to hide.
      void onShowcaseViewShow(ShowcaseView showcaseView)
      Called when the ShowcaseView is shown.
      void onShowcaseViewTouchBlocked(android.view.MotionEvent motionEvent)

    • Method Detail

      • onShowcaseViewHide

        public void onShowcaseViewHide(ShowcaseView showcaseView)
        Description copied from interface: OnShowcaseEventListener
        Called when the ShowcaseView has been told to hide. Use OnShowcaseEventListener.onShowcaseViewDidHide(ShowcaseView) if you want to know when the ShowcaseView has been fully hidden.
        Specified by:
        onShowcaseViewHide in interface OnShowcaseEventListener
